channel.title: Softlayer_container_hardware_server_configuration on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_hardware_server_configuration on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Configuration Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Configuration data type contains information relating to a server’s item price information, and hard drive partition information. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getObject Local addToSparePoolAfterOsReload A flag indicating that the server will be moved into the spare pool after an Operating system reload. Type: integer customProvisionScriptUri The customer provision uri will be used to download and execute a customer defined script on the host at the end of provisioning.

Type: integer customProvisionScriptUri The customer provision uri will be used to download and execute a customer defined script on the host at the end of provisioning.
